attribute.name: pre_installation
attribute.value: cd $SRCDIR;git remote add dce git://github.com/thehajime/net-next-sim.git; git fetch dce; git merge dce/sim-ns3-3.5.0-branch; echo 'CONFIG_MPTCP=y' >> arch/sim/defconfig; sed 's/CONFIG_SYN_COOKIES=y/\#CONFIG_SYN_COOKIES=y/' arch/sim/defconfig >a; mv a arch/sim/defconfig

attribute.name: post_installation
attribute.value: mkdir -p $INSTALLDIR/bin_dce; cd $INSTALLDIR/bin_dce; cp $SRCDIR/libsim-linux3.5.7.so ./libsim-linux3.5.7-mptcp.so; ln -s -f libsim-linux3.5.7-mptcp.so liblinux.so

attribute.name: pre_installation
attribute.value: cd $SRCDIR;git remote add dce git://github.com/thehajime/net-next-sim.git; git fetch dce; git merge dce/sim-ns3-3.10.0-branch; echo 'CONFIG_MPTCP=y' >> arch/sim/defconfig; sed 's/CONFIG_SYN_COOKIES=y/\#CONFIG_SYN_COOKIES=y/' arch/sim/defconfig >a; mv a arch/sim/defconfig

attribute.name: post_installation
attribute.value: mkdir -p $INSTALLDIR/bin_dce; cd $INSTALLDIR/bin_dce; cp $SRCDIR/libsim-linux3.10.9.so ./libsim-linux3.10.9-mptcp.so; ln -s -f libsim-linux3.10.9-mptcp.so liblinux.so

attribute.name: build_arguments
attribute.value: CCOPTS+=-fpic CCOPTS+=-D_GNU_SOURCE CCOPTS+=-O0 CCOPTS+=-U_FORTIFY_SOURCE LDFLAGS=-pie LDFLAGS+=-rdynamic DEFINES+=-I$SRCDIR/../mptcp/arch/sim/include/ DEFINES+=-I$SRCDIR/../mptcp/include/uapi/ DEFINES+=-I$SRCDIR/../mptcp/include

attribute.name: pre_installation
attribute.value: cd $SRCDIR ; python setup.py build_ext --inplace ; ln -s $SRCDIR/build/temp.linux-x86_64-2.7 $SRCDIR/numpy/core/src/npylibs ; ln -s $SRCDIR/numpy $SRCDIR/../Python-2.7.13/Modules/numpy

attribute.name: pre_installation
attribute.value: cd $SRCDIR ; chmod +x get_source.sh ; ./get_source.sh ; chmod +x configure ; cd jdk ; hg checkout 8fe85977d5a6 ; patch -p1 -i $SRCDIR/../../jdk.patch ; cd ../hotspot ; hg checkout 88ae10297731 ; patch -p1 -i $SRCDIR/../../hotspot.patch

attribute.name: post_installation
attribute.value: mkdir $SRCDIR/files-0 ; ln -s $INSTALLDIR/lib/python2.7 $SRCDIR/files-0/ ; cp -r $SRCDIR/../pox $SRCDIR/files-0/ ; cp $SRCDIR/../ryu/bin/ryu-manager $SRCDIR/files-0/ ; cp -r $SRCDIR/../ryu/ryu $SRCDIR/files-0/; cp -r $SRCDIR/../ryu/etc $SRCDIR/files-0/

attribute.name: build_arguments
attribute.value: CCOPTS+=-fpic CCOPTS+=-D_GNU_SOURCE CCOPTS+=-O0 CCOPTS+=-U_FORTIFY_SOURCE CCOPTS+=-g LDFLAGS=-pie LDFLAGS+=-rdynamic

Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat. Duis aute irure dolor in reprehenderit in voluptate velit esse cillum dolore eu fugiat nulla pariatur. Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident, sunt in culpa qui officia deserunt mollit anim id est laborum. attribute.name: post_installation
attribute.value: echo 'communicator : afunix:///tmp/gvirtus:0666' > $INSTALLDIR/etc/cudadr.properties ; echo 'plugins : $INSTALLDIR/lib/backend/libcudadr-backend.so' >> $INSTALLDIR/etc/cudadr.properties ; echo 'communicator : tap://128.0.0.1:50' > $INSTALLDIR/etc/cudadr-tap.properties ; echo 'plugins : $INSTALLDIR/lib/backend/libcudadr-backend.so' >> $INSTALLDIR/etc/cudadr-tap.properties ; echo 'communicator : afunix:///tmp/gvirtus:0666' > $INSTALLDIR/etc/cudart.properties ; echo 'plugins : $INSTALLDIR/lib/backend/libcudart-backend.so' >> $INSTALLDIR/etc/cudart.properties ; echo 'communicator : tap://128.0.0.1:50' > $INSTALLDIR/etc/cudart-tap.properties ; echo 'plugins : $INSTALLDIR/lib/backend/libcudart-backend.so' >> $INSTALLDIR/etc/cudart-tap.properties

attribute.name: post_installation
attribute.value: sudo cp -r $SRCDIR/include/*.h /usr/include; sudo cp $SRCDIR/bin/*.so /usr/local/lib ; sudo ldconfig
